overview: Roger Humphries has been suffering from Insomnia all his life with each year getting deeper and deeper into a hole of which he doesn't think he'll ever return. In a last ditch effort to cure himself he goes to the aid of a sleep specialist who in return uses Roger as his own personal guinea pig to test a new drug. The problem is the exhaustion on the mind and body has Roger seeing things that aren't there but with the new meds he'll soon be seeing things in a more horrifying light.
title: Insomniac
